entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider offering a way to disable `libmsquic` testing #110556
  • [API Proposal]:Add property to HttpClient #110555
  • Trim analysis fails to track integer across iterator yield #110553
    10.0.0
  • Crashes during debugging when pausing in VS2022/.NET9 #110552
  • Network-path references in Uri class are not being parsed #110549
  • New hard crash after targeting .net 9 from 8 #110543
  • Windows Defender incorrectly detects malware in ZIP files containing .NET 9 AOT binaries #110541
  • Possible Task.WhenAll performance improvements #110530
  • HttpClient(AndroidMessageHandler) with NTLM v2 auth and Self Signed Certificate returns 401 Unauthorized #110523
    Future
  • Converting from GB18030 encoded bytes to chars throws Exception #110521
  • Semantic Versioning of Azure packages and the System Namespace #110519
  • Test failure: readytorun/tests/mainv2/mainv2.cmd #110512
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.Tests.InvokeInterpretedTests.VerifyInvokeIsUsingInterpreter_Method #110511
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: _Sse41_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Sse41.Program.RoundToNearestIntegerSingle() #110510
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `ReadOnlySpan<char>` overloads for `StringNormalizationExtensions` #87757
    10.0.0
  • Trying to create static library or native library and testing with C like Rust #110546
  • [API Proposal]: Add abstraction interface for System.Environment #110537
  • [WASM] System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests - Specified cast is not valid. #62125
    Future
  • Freezes When Blazor WebAssembly publish #93076
    8.0.0
  • JSImportGenerator renders VS completely unusable when making edits in large projects #88215
    8.0.0
  • Document profiling.md missmatch with code #109722
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `System.Text.RegularExpressions.ValueMatch.GroupName` #110383
  • [wasi] Enable debugger support using wasi preview/2 apis #101253
    10.0.0
  • linux-armel checked CoreCLR_NonPortable build failing in CI #110517
  • Wrong random read behaviour in StreamReader #110509
  • Incorrect nullability declaration with return value of LocalCertificateSelectionCallback delegate #110444

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110551
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] skip the most time-consuming test case for non-Release builds to avoid timeouts for checked builds #110550
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 10.0.0
  • [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110548
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cDAC] SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData DynamicMethodObject #110545
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix EventPipe demo after running mono on deputy #110544
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove ld_classic in 16+ #110542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [dac] Make `GetObjectStringData` return the needed buffer element count instead of byte count #110540
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] fix code gen overflow #110539
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix test under JIT stress #110538
    area-System.Reflection, test-bug, 10.0.0
  • Avoid a list/array allocation in Task.WhenAll(enumerable) #110536
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Avoid comparing regnums in `GenTreeHWIntrinsic::Equals` #110535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from library tests, WBT and docs #110534
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110533
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Include more edges in `BlockDominancePreds` #110531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Disable HybridGlobalization tests on WASM #110526
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove FabricBot from area-owners.md #110525
    area-Meta
  • Fix CMP0173 policy warning with cmake 3.31 #110522
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix coreclr interpreter build #110520
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Spill newarr into temp #110518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix assertion due to remorph #110516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix aka.ms URL in host's missing framework error #110513
    area-Host, community-contribution

Merged

  • Normalization APIs using the spans #110465
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Handle no method def token when trying to get the IL version state #110449
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Added a fix for the build failure when STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT is defined. #110506
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Change assertion in IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet #110070
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • fix profiling env var names in profiling.md #109764
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110484
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasi] bump wasmtime to v27 #110524
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Fix linux-armel build #110514
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove some RuntimeExport/RuntimeImport indirections #110437
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete unused static field from List #110515
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix nullability of LocalCertificateSelectionCallback return #110479
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Enable more ILLinker skipped tests on native AOT #110353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Propagate assertions into natural loops in global morph #110501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `VisitLoopBlocksLexical` utility #110490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Propagate delegate loads during inlining #109715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Gc poll without HELPER_METHOD_FRAME #109378
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix calculation of `MethodDesc` optional slot addresses #110491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: extract BBJ_COND to BBJ_ALWAYS profile repair as utility #110494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up surrogate validation in HttpUtility #110478
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • CI test: Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • Add vector support to System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount for Byte and Int16 #110333
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110481
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][workloads] Check downlevel runtime versions #102190
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads, 10.0.0
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.StartRequestAsync assertion failed #109799
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110440
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110438
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][interp] Remove no_inlining functionality for dead bblocks #110468
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Allow using H/3 with WinHttpHandler #109508
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce a setting for automatically disabling the implicit restore #45387
  • dotnet 9 fails on macOS Catalina due to a missing symbol in libc++ #45382
  • allow generation of gitignore by project type for vs and vs code #45373
  • dotnet-gcdump issues on .NET 8 #45372

Closed

  • net9 cli timestamp problem #45386
  • .NET 9 AppCrash when published in release configuration, x86 #45349

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.2xx] Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch verb and noun for package/reference add/remove/list Fixes #9650 #45384
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #45383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix BuildPass>1 artifacts and asset manifest content #45323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Temporarily disable tests on AzureLinux_x64_Cross_Mono #45276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Check how often each command resolver is used #45356
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure all template code files(C#, F#, VB) have consistent BOM #41376
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Only add guid on slnv12 files #45366
    untriaged
  • Agent fixes #45369
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add mstest dependency #45322
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the Windows dev versions leg to x86 #45362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • allow reading all mcr image names #44738
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Please update pattern-matching issue with LDM meeting links #204
  • Spec requires infinite recursion in compilers. #172
  • [Proposal]: Make generated `Program` for top-level statements public by default #6769
    Needs More Work

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas (VS 17.5, .NET 8) #6051
    12.0
  • Revise spec for C# 7.6.2.1 Invariant meaning in blocks #298

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix a typo #8858
  • Update README.md #8857
  • Update simple-lambda-parameters-with-modifiers.md #8856
  • Update README.md: add prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> #8846

Updated

  • Remove scope variance exceptions from the speclet #8777

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interceptors should not internally identify calls using paths #76341
    17.13

Closed

  • Generate Constructor code fix copies attributes, even those inaccessible in the derived class #19611
    Backlog
  • Code Style: use block body for accessors: doesn't format correctly #61279
    Backlog
  • Converting setter to block body leaves set keyword on getter line #23251
    Backlog
  • "Move declaration near reference" can change behavior of a program for captured variables #25741
    Backlog
  • IDE0050 - Convert to tuple makes a mess with trailing commas and whitespace #50470
    Backlog
  • Code Cleanup Hangs When Attempting To Fix CS1998 #68249
  • Generate constructor with parameter disables implicit constructor #51049
    Backlog
  • Generate constructor/Generate default constructor should be grouped together #34206
    Backlog
  • EditorConfig: ingnoring end_of_line when sort directives or separate import directive groups #44136
    Backlog
  • BUG: IDE0051 not working when file contains `nameof()` #54972
    Backlog
  • Text Editor does not Center when I select a Method in Document Outline Window #76242
  • "Convert to method": `nameof` expression in attributes is converted to string literal #64904
    Backlog
  • Mark `public` modifier on interface methods as unnecessary #47448
    Backlog
  • IDE0040 (Add accessibility modifiers) is not enforced for types nested in interfaces #74245
    Backlog
  • 'dotnet_style_require_accessibility_modifiers = always' doesn't work for interface members #74244
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow extract method even when tokens aren't perfectly selected by the user. #76345
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Internally identify interceptions by content hash #76344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Interceptors
  • Do not pull out 'using local decl' variables unnecessarily in extract method. #76343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [wip] Introduce local variable supporting target-type new syntax #76342
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle other initializer kinds in ref safety analysis #76339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Filter out inaccessible attributes when generating default constructors #76329
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clarify comment on SystemTextJsonVersion #76338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Center the symbol being navigated to when navigating through doc-outline #76326
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix formatting of accessor blocks in 'use block body' #76333
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Make it clearer when 'move declaration' might change semantics #76331
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Improve formatting in 'convert anon type to tuple' #76315
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clean up extract method tests #76340
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Generate delegating constructor should make the implicit no-arg constructor explicit to preserve binary and source compat #76330
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Unify user experience with disparate 'generate constructor' features #76328
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update 'sort usings' to always preserve the new-lines that were present in the document #76332
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue with nameof(MemberGroup) caused us to consider all members used #76335
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add f1 item for global usings #76327
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Attempt to reuse 'nameof' expressions in attributes when converting from a local function to a method #76325
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update add/remove accessibility modifiers for interfaces #76324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Indent expressions when converting to object initializer #76334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Mark interceptors feature as stable and deprecate file path based attributes #76312
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Interceptors
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Threading fixes #76230
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Check ref safety of arg mixing in collection initializers #76237
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ref Fields, 17.13
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Backport] RedirectFeaturesAnalyzers test fixes #76010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Support adding package and reference assemblies from an import #76337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Blazor Web App template - build is broken #59404
  • .NET 9 breaks ShouldSerializeXXX methods in data model (NullReferenceException) #59402
  • Perf improvement: single_query #59401
  • When using Harsh Routing (Introduced in .Net 8x) allow component element to preserve query params #59400
  • index.html default file not found when using UseDefaultFiles and MapStaticAssets (ASP.NET 9) #59399
  • Problem Details camel case RFC 7807 "compliant casing" #59396
  • OpenApi will use System.ComponentModel.Attributes changed to Fluent mode. #59393
  • Blazor - JSImport feature makes deterministic builds impossible #59392
  • Minimal API inconsistent results for 403 status code #59391
  • Unexpected error when using records #59384
  • Give the ability to devs to trigger manually hot reloads #59383

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #59385
  • WebSockets: No timeout associated to Ping-Pong-Frames #24614
    9.0.0
  • Hash routing was added in 8x but doesn't work in Blazor Server Apps #59353
  • Is standalone WASM not supported anymore in .NET 9.0? #59386
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, multiple_queries #59380

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more required publish args #59405
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59403
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24609.2 #59389
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Upgrade Facebook Graph API version to v21.0 #59387
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59352
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix SFX issues causing sdk injestion failures #59398
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages 2024-12-05 #59339
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59362
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59360
    area-networking
  • [LoongArch64]: Enable the crossgen2 tool to optimize aspnetcore runtime #59131
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change OpenAPI document name resolution to be case-insensitive #59199
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59348
    area-blazor, ask-mode, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, 9.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Adding DATAS GC info to !eeversion #5090

PullRequests

  • Fix !maddress does work - issue #5091 #5094

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish to Windows Store (Side Loading) of Maui app fails when a .NETStandard 2.1 library is referenced. #26485
  • Simplify the starter template #26484
  • Survey! Let us know how we are doing in the repo! #26482
    .NET 9 SR3
  • DisplayAlert/ActionSheet Fails on Windows, Android, and Mac #26481
  • [WINDOWS]SearchHandler Fails to Display Results on Windows #26477
    Backlog
  • Flyout menu (Hamburger menu) appears "out of nowhere" when BackbuttonBehaviour is defined (Android only) #26470
    .NET 9 SR3

Closed

  • [WinUI] Displaying an `ActionSheet` does not expand #22885
    Backlog
  • emulator chashes when dragged on second screen #26211
  • [MAUI] error NETSDK1082 & error 'XAPRAS7004 will happen when solution name with "()" or solution in directories with “()” #26092
    Backlog
  • Build stuck on Extracting Extracting ...\XamarinBuildDownloadCache\GMps-9.1.1.tgz to ...\XamarinBuildDownloadCache\GMps-9.1.1 #26045
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS, ANDROID] FlyoutIsPresented is not working as expected on Android and Windows when navigating between FlyoutItems #26422
  • [Android] SearchHandler.Focused event never fires #24670
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fix DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #24914
    Backlog
  • Android FlyoutPage does not display navigation bar NET 8 #26472
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync() - When popping a modal page off the stack and app loses focus - Modal Page does not leave the UI. #26418
  • The LeadingContent of the TitleBar appears before the App Info section. #26378
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] D13_ The background color is inconsistent and varies in light and dark colors. #26356
  • CarouselView EmptyView not visible initially #11847
    Backlog
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24966
    Backlog
  • [Android] `RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand` of `CarouselView` is not triggered #24571
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Error while completing the steps for Maui App, please help #26363
  • iOS - OnNavigatedFrom is not fired when navigating back by swiping #26216
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Warning due to implementation of "performFetchWithCompletionHandler" although "PerformFetch" was not implemented #26462
  • How to Enable Zoom Feature for BlazorWebView MAUI Hybrid on Android? #26457
  • HttpClient GET Api is failing with {System.IO.IOException: Connection reset ---> Java.Net.SocketException: Connection reset error in .NET MAUI Android #26147

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241209202058740 to main #26483
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10679157 #26479
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] ScrollView - Setting SetClipChildren to false #26475
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #26474
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Correct Button EventHandler signature in template #26473
    area-templates
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 38 #26469
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Incorrect First and Last Visible Item index in CollectionView Scrolled Event #26468
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Revert "[release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages" #26478
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR3
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Set up MauiGResources for Localization #26412
    area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241206202628657 to main #26444
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Add missing android font weight #26450
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand of CarouselView is not triggered #25574
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Added DidPopItem to the navigation renderer #26235
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3

Updated

  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/1, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR3
  • Cleans up the blank starter template #26448
    area-templates, community ✨
  • Fix and verify shadow / shape / clip #24941
    area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core error when inserting new records with multiple relation with another entity. #35302
  • EF Core InMemory database throws an argument exception on Nullable<>.ToString #35299
  • When using SplitToTable, FKs are created for the wrong table #35298

Closed

  • [Perf] consider not using Expression.Invoke in CreateGetValueExpression for value with converter when possible #35129
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Int32' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]'. #35303

PullRequests

Created

  • [TINY] Fix to #35281 - Migrations: CreateTableBuilder<TColumns> Annotation(string name, object value) should accept object? instead #35297
